channel.title: Urban Network Music Marketing Podcast
channel.description: The Urban Network Music Marketing Podcast: Tips, Tricks, and Advice for the Emerging Artist. Each show is packed with important information, artist features, and advice from industry professionals to help the emerging artist take their career to the next level.
channel.itunes:author: Evo Marketing / Urban Network
channel.itunes:summary: The Urban Network Music Marketing Podcast: Tips, Tricks, and Advice for the Emerging Artist.

item.title: Database Building and Email Marketing
item.description: The Urban Network Music Marketing Podcast: Tip, Tricks, and Advice for the Emerging Artist. In this edition, we talk about database building and email marketing. Our featured artist is Cynthia Turner and Heartspeak. Also, we get to hear from Arthur Mitchell and his advice for database building and ways to improve your newsletter campaigns.
item.itunes:author: Evo Marketing / Urban Network
